item.title: Report X-2025011074
item.description:
Report X-2025011074

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-31T00:56:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-22
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A LEAKING AIR PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED A SINGLE ONE GALLON JUG OF PHOSPHORIC ACID LEAKING FROM THE CLOSURE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM TEXAS USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 6AR804, PRO BREW SUPPLY, 5200 AIRPORT FWY, HALTOM CITY TX 76117-5923.

item.description:

  • City: LENEXA

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A LEAKING HAZMAT WAS DISCOVERED IRREG BELT DOOR 265 PD5 5. THE RESPONDER USING ALL NECESSARY PPE ND DECISION TREE. PLACED THE PACKAGE IN A LINED SPILL TUB. RESPONDER USED UNIVERSAL ABSORBENT TO ABSORB THE MATERIAL AND MOVED THE PACKAGE TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2025011073
item.description:
Report X-2025011073

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-31T00:56:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-17
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: UNLOAD SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER TO THE LEAKER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKER. RESPONDER USED THE DECSION TREE WHICH LED TO THE FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE PAGE. RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL FOLLOWING GUIDLINES ON THE PAGE. RESPONDER BROUGHT BACK LEAKER AND INFECTED PACKAGES TO THE DMP.

item.title: Report X-2025010938
item.description:
Report X-2025010938

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-31T00:56:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-16
  • City: WICHITA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNTIED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SPA PERSON NOTICED LEAKING PACKAGE AND CALLED RESPONDER. RESPONDER DISCOVERED CORRUGATED BOX WITH LEAK ON ONE CORNER AND SERVAL LEAKED ON PACKAGES. THE PACKAGE WAS LABELED WITH FLAMMABLE LIQUID 3 ISOPROPANOL UN#1219. INSIDE THERE WERE TWO INNER CORRUGATED BOXES WITH NO EXTRA SPACE TO MOVE. INSIDE EACH INNER BOX WAS A PLASTIC BOTTLE. ONE BOTTLE HAD A LOOSE LID.

item.title: Report X-2025010937
item.description:
Report X-2025010937

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-31T00:56:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-16
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RMP SPECIALIST NOTICED THAT THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING WHEN HE WAS AUDITING THE HAZMATS. AFTER FURTHER INSPECTION, IT WAS FOUND THAT ONE OF THE TWO CONTAINER WAS LEAKING DUE TO A LOOSE CAP/LID CAUSING DAMAGE TO BOTH CONTAINERS.

  • Description: UNDECLARED LEAKING PACKAGE. UPON OPENING THE PACKAGE IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT IT CONTAINS LTD QTY AEROSOL CANS. THE LEAKING PACKAGE LEAKED ON 2 ADDITIOAL UNDECLARED PACKAGES FROM THE SAME SHIPPER, SAME CONTENTS (24 AEROSOL CANS IN EACH BOX). ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBERS: 1Z1296430300874404 AND 1Z1296430300874397
